creator: jepp@cas.org
text:
This is something that would be useful to have if you're working with the API.

I specifically found need for it when working with the ProxyControl API because deliverSampler works with JMeterTreeNodes.  So to output usable JMX with SaveService, I had to write code that traverses a JMeterTreeModel and builds a ListedHashTree.  (It didn't end up being especially long, but it was tricky to debug.)

Hi Wyatt,
Would you like to contribute your work ?

Thanks
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com

text:
(In reply to Philippe Mouawad from comment #1)
> Hi Wyatt,
> Would you like to contribute your work ?
I'd love to!  If my proxy daemon ever gets through legal, I'll even be able to contribute the bulk of what's needed for this (I think), though I haven't integrated it with SaveService at all.

We're building up for public release of a new product very soon, so hopefully I'll be able to make headway on releasing code after that.

But if someone gets to this before then, that's good too.
creator: jepp@cas.org
